name: 36 (stext25)
description:
INTRO Welcome to 36 - A number game!

This is a relaxing simple puzzle game based on numbers. 

The rules are simple:

RULES
  1. Click on a tile with mouse or touch!
  2. Fill the table with numbers from 1 to 36!
  3. Horizontal & Vertical: A number must be placed exactly in the third box away from the previous number! 
  4. Vertical: A number must be placed exactly in the second box away from the previous number!
  5. No more moves? Try the restart button!
INFO

Lastly, have fun and some relax! Try to finish the game in fewer attempts! 

If you like this game leave a comment below, and if you want follow me on my channel! That would be awesome!

Thank you all!
